items.title: One chart shows how much optimism has been wiped out of the 'Magnificent 7' because of Trump tariffs
items.description: It hasn't been pretty for the "Magnificent Seven."

items.title: 'Magnificent 7' stocks continue getting hammered as Trump tariffs drag markets lower
items.description: The Magnificent Seven tech stocks continued their sell-off Monday as the Trump administrationâ€™s global tariff plan rocked markets.

items.title: Amazon airline prioritizes bigger aircraft to handle third-party cargo
items.description: Amazon has restructured its air network to accommodate the need for fewer short-haul package flights and a new clientele of shippers with heavy freight. The post Amazon airline prioritizes bigger aircraft to handle third-party cargo appeared first on FreightWaves.
